message: Let's split it almost evenly, but I get slightly more since I have to make the first move and bear the risk of you declining.
I'm willing to give you a little less than you offered me since I now have the power to propose. But be warned, if you keep rejecting offers, the value of the money will decrease!
Bob, let's be reasonable. We're losing money with every round. I propose a fair 50/50 split.
